definition[0]: helping you to deal with a problem quickly and effectively although sometimes in a way that is not morally right
example[0]: This solution is politically expedient but may well cause long-term problems.
example[1]: We think it is expedient to make a good-will gesture to the new administration.
definition[1]: a quick and effective way of dealing with a problem
example[2]: Moore escaped by the simple expedient of lying down in a clump of grass.
